```ts reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota.rs/tree/develop/client/bindings/nodejs/examples/05_get_address_balance
```

You can run the example by running the following command from the `bindings/node/examples/` folder:

```bash
node dist/05_get_address_balance.js
```
